nodes.text: Cantocoins were a type of gambling chit made from precious metal and used as currency in the Canto Casino in the city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica. The coins came in three sizes of flat circular disc, with the largest being gold in color, the second largest being silver, and the smallest being bronze.

Cantocoins were created for the film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, which released on December 15, 2017; however, they appeared prior to the film's release in the short story "The Ride" by John Jackson Miller, which was released in the anthology book Canto Bight on December 5 as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi promotional campaign.
